snippet: A minister in India’s most populous state, Uttar Pradesh, has said bureaucrats can steal a little as long as they work hard, prompting a national outcry in a country long plagued by corruption scandals.
abstract: Minister in India’s most populous state Uttar Pradesh says bureaucrats can steal a little as long as they work hard, prompting a national outcry in a country long plagued by corruption scandals.
lead_paragraph: A minister in India’s most populous state, Uttar Pradesh, has said bureaucrats can steal a little as long as they work hard, prompting a national outcry in a country long plagued by corruption scandals.

headline.main: India: Official’s Advice Prompts an Outcry
headline.print_headline: India: Official’s Advice Prompts an Outcry
